code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useNavigate,useParams}from'react-router-dom';import classes from'./search.module.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";Search.defaultProps={searchRoute:'/search/',defaultRoute:'/',placeholder:'Search Food Mine!'};export default function Search(_ref){let{searchRoute,defaultRoute,margin,placeholder}=_ref;const[term,setTerm]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const{searchTerm}=useParams();useEffect(()=>{setTerm(searchTerm!==null&&searchTerm!==void 0?searchTerm:'');},[searchTerm]);const search=async()=>{term?navigate(searchRoute+term):navigate(defaultRoute);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:classes.container,style:{margin},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:placeholder,onChange:e=>setTerm(e.target.value),onKeyUp:e=>e.key==='Enter'&&search(),value:term}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:search,children:"Search"})]});}
